backend/main.mo: Motoko canister handling user profiles, authorization, and storing/retrieving photo metadata using mixin-based blob storage.
feature_evidence.json: Structured report listing implemented features, associated files, components, and test references for traceability.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summary map describing the purpose and behavior of key frontend files.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS base layer defining OKLCH color tokens, light/dark modes, and shared UI variables.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML document setting viewport rules, preloading splash assets, and loading the main React entrypoint.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up the TanStack Router with routes for splash, onboarding, home, camera, vault/moments, notifications, and other screens.
frontend/src/components/ConfirmDeleteMod: Reusable modal component for confirming deletion actions with a backdrop and cancel/confirm buttons.
frontend/src/components/EmojiFloatOverla: Generates animated floating emojis with staggered delays, respecting reduced‑motion settings.
frontend/src/components/HamburgerMenu.ts: Empty file placeholder for a hamburger menu component.
frontend/src/components/HomeWeeklyCalend: Renders a weekly calendar strip with navigation, date selection, and visual indicators for dates with moments.
frontend/src/components/InlineToast.tsx: Displays a temporary toast message with fade animations and configurable placement.
frontend/src/components/MomentsImageCard: Shows a moments photo with user info, timestamp, image, and optional metadata such as who, reflection, and feeling.
frontend/src/components/PlannedMomentBot: Provides a bottom-sheet UI for creating planned moments with time, date selection, and auto-assigned colors.
frontend/src/components/PlannedMomentCar: Displays a planned moment with formatted date/time, color indicator, and share/delete actions.
frontend/src/components/SignInOverlay.ts: Empty file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refetching dependent queries when the actor updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useAutoGeolocation.ts: Requests geolocation once per session and returns coordinates via callback when enabled.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackSlideNavigatio: Provides a slide-back exit animation handler before triggering navigation.
frontend/src/hooks/useGentleAutoScroll.t: Enables gentle auto-scrolling of a container with pause-on-interaction and reduced-motion support.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and provider for Internet Identity authentication using AuthClient with login, logout, and status handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useInView.ts: Hook using IntersectionObserver to detect when an element enters the viewport and expose a ref and boolean.
frontend/src/hooks/useMomentsPhotos.ts: Loads stored moment photos, tracks the most recent, and updates on storage or custom events.
frontend/src/hooks/usePlannedMoments.ts: Manages planned moments state, syncing with storage, and provides add/delete helpers and date metadata.
frontend/src/hooks/useProfile.ts: Handles user profile loading, saving, auto-geolocation population, and updates via events or storage changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder file for future backend React Query hooks with no current functionality.
frontend/src/hooks/useSwipeGesture.ts: Implements touch and mouse swipe detection with thresholding and scroll prevention, exposing listener attachment.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global styles, Tailwind layers, light/dark design tokens, and custom components styling including glass card and calendar UI.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and mounts the root component.
frontend/src/pages/CalendarPage.tsx: Renders a weekly calendar view with planned/photo moment indicators, navigation, and bottom sheet interaction.
frontend/src/pages/CameraScreen.tsx: Camera screen that handles camera activation, photo capture, file upload, draft saving, and navigation.
frontend/src/pages/HomeScreen.tsx: Home dashboard showing planned moments, calendar, navigation, sharing, and moment management.
frontend/src/pages/MobileSplashScreen.ts: Animated multi‑card onboarding splash screen with auto‑advance and Internet Identity login flow.
frontend/src/pages/MomentFeelingCheckPag: Lets users assign a feeling to a saved moment, updates storage, clears draft, and redirects to vault.
frontend/src/pages/NotificationsPage.tsx: Notifications page with slide‑back navigation and an empty‑state message.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Profile editing page allowing name, location, picture updates, invite‑code copying, and navigation.
frontend/src/pages/SaveMomentConfirmPage: Handles loading a captured moment draft, letting the user add who/notes, and saving it to local storage before navigating to the feeling check.
frontend/src/pages/SettingsPage.tsx: Displays settings UI with navigation, account/subscription placeholders, and logout handling using Internet Identity.
frontend/src/pages/VaultMomentPage.tsx: Shows a single saved moment with swipe navigation, feeling display, and delete confirmation.
frontend/src/pages/VaultPage.tsx: Loads and groups saved moments by month, renders a grid with delete options, and navigates to individual moment pages.
frontend/src/pages/WelcomePage.tsx: Shows animated welcome screen with entrance effects and a button to go to the home page.
frontend/src/utils/momentFeelings.ts: Defines feeling types and options with labels and emojis, plus helper functions to get their emoji, label, or full option.
LocalStorage helpers for saving, loading, updating, and capping moment photos at 10 items with event dispatching and error handling.
frontend/src/utils/pendingMomentDraftSto: SessionStorage utilities for saving, loading, and clearing temporary moment drafts, confirmations, and saved moment IDs.
frontend/src/utils/plannedMomentShareTex: Generates human-readable share text for planned moments using formatted date, time, title, and optional display name.
frontend/src/utils/plannedMomentsStorage: LocalStorage management for planned moments with deterministic color assignment, one-per-day enforcement, and change events.
frontend/src/utils/profileStorage.ts: LocalStorage-based user profile loader and saver that ensures an invite code exists and emits update events.
frontend/src/utils/timeFormat.ts: Formats timestamps into relative time strings like seconds, minutes, hours, days, or short dates.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading URL params, persisting them in sessionStorage, and optionally cleaning them from the URL hash.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, OKLCH color variables, animations, and plugin setup.
project_state.json: Stores the project’s high-level app description, version info, and a list of implemented features with IDs, titles, synonyms, descriptions, and versions. Captures current client-side, backend, and UI capabilities for planning future development.
